title: Can I pray Night Prayer (Qiyam al layl) immediately after Isha or before sleeping, would this count?
transcript: about the night prayers net instead of sahaja Thai prayer night prayer after immediately after Isha prayer so it is valid or not Osama from Pakistan he says that can I pray night prayer before sleeping or this would not work okay a rule of thumb any prayer you pray after Isha and before fed your time this is called night prayer it's a big umbrella underneath this big umbrella we have Tara we we have to hide Jude we have night prayer nephal so if you decide to pray all of your night prayers after Asia good for you if you say no I'd like to pray it before I go to bed good for you if you say no I'd like to go to bed and wake up an hour before Fechter or in the middle of the night and pray to hedge it that's good for you you can do either one you wish providing you don't as in Amenas question you do not repeat The Witcher The Witcher is prayed once and the most recommended is to conclude all of your night prayers with this Witter and Allah knows best
